lines: 1. Bwenzi palibe loposa Yesu, palibe, palibe
Wina palibe wochiza nthenda, palibe, palibe.
Yesu adziwa zovuta zo, Atitsogoza konseko;
Bwenzi palibe lofana naye; Palibe, palibe.
2. Bwenzi palibe lofana naye, palibe, palibe
Iye ngofatsa koposa onse, palibe, palibe.
Akondweretsa mu mdima monse, palibe, palibe.
4. Iye samasiya munthu wake, palibe, palibe
Pena kukana wolapa konse, palibe, palibe.
5. Mphatso palibe yofana Yesu, palibe, palibe
Iye satimana malo mâ€™mwamba? Palibe, palibe.
